metadata.title: AI Tools - Background Remover, Object Remover & Image Expander
metadata.description: Professional AI-powered image editing tools. Remove backgrounds, erase unwanted objects, and expand image boundaries with one click.

hero.title: Professional AI Image Tools
hero.description: Transform your images with our suite of powerful AI-powered editing tools. Fast, accurate, and incredibly easy to use.

tools.title: All Available Tools
tools.description: Choose the perfect tool for your image editing needs.

items.title: Background Remover
items.description: Remove image backgrounds instantly with AI precision. Perfect for product photos, portraits, and more.

items.title: Object Remover
items.description: Erase unwanted objects from your photos seamlessly. Remove people, text, watermarks, and more.

items.title: Image Expander
items.description: Expand your image boundaries intelligently. AI fills in the extended areas naturally.

cta.title: Ready to Edit Your Images?
cta.description: Start using our professional AI tools today.
